Introduction

ILUV (Korean: 아이러브; formerly spelled as I LUV) was a seven-member girl group under WKS ENE. They debuted on April 30, 2019 with the digital single "Got It". They are suspected to have disbanded in 2020, after the company removed the group from their website and announced they were debuting a new girl group. Before their official debut, they released a digital single titled "P-Pay Song" on January 30, 2019.
